SoapErrorMessageFormatter
ErrorMessageFormatters
ErrorMessageFormatter that returns a standard SOAP fault message.
See also
Github - SoapErrorMessageFormatter Implementation Examples
Javadoc - org.frankframework.errormessageformatters.SoapErrorMessageFormatter
Syntax
Copy
<SoapErrorMessageFormatter />
Attributes
Required

This component has no required attributes

Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
styleSheet	text	-
URL to the stylesheet used to transform the output of the standard ErrorMessageFormatter
styleSheetName	text	-
URL to the stylesheet used to transform the output of the standard ErrorMessageFormatter
xpathExpression	text	-
XPathExpression to use for transformation
ErrorMessageFormatter
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
messageFormat	options	XML
Format the error message as XML or as JSON.
Available Options: XML, JSON
active	text	-
If defined and empty
